recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should be addressed to the Privacy Officer identified above.  The Company will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints regarding violations of its published privacy policy directly with the complainant.  In the event that the complaint cannot be resolved by the Company internally, the complainant may submit the matter to binding arbitration before the American Arbitration Association in San Diego, California. For complaints that involve organization human resources data, the Company will cooperate and comply with the EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
